### Tender Description

The Agricultural & Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Agassiz Research and Development Centre (ARDC) is seeking tenders for the deconstruction of two cattle sheds. The tender comprises the dismantling of building components in a systematic manner, sorting waste at source, and diverting 90% of deconstructed materials from landfill, by weight. The contractor must provide weigh scale tickets or other accepted waste manifest documentation as part of the project close out.

With tender documents released on November 17, 2023, this is an invitation to bid, open to all qualified service providers. The successful contractor must execute and complete the work on or before March 29, 2024.
